meanings.definition: To eat more food than is necessary or healthy.
meanings.sent1: Sometimes I overeat at dinner and feel too full.
meanings.sent2: It is important not to overeat to maintain a balanced diet.
meanings.sent3: I tend to overeat at parties and regret it later.
meanings.sent4: Her love for desserts makes her overeat like there's no tomorrow.
meanings.sent5: Overeating can lead to stomach discomfort and weight gain.

meanings.sent1: When I'm stressed, I tend to overeat junk food.
meanings.sent2: It's easy to overeat when the food is delicious.
meanings.sent3: I always overeat at buffets because everything looks so good.
meanings.sent4: Overeating sweets can be as addictive as any other bad habit.
meanings.sent5: She tends to overeat when she's feeling emotional.
